meanings.definition: Relating to the production of silk through the cultivation of silkworms.
meanings.sent1: The sericultural process involves carefully tending to silkworms to obtain silk.
meanings.sent2: She studied the sericultural techniques used in silk production.
meanings.sent3: The sericultural experts were like guardians to the delicate silkworms.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to sericultural practices was as intricate as a spider weaving its web.
meanings.sent5: The sericultural farm was a mesmerizing sight with rows of silkworms munching on mulberry leaves.
